DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in order to evaluate the effect of remote ischemic preconditioning on children undergoing cardiac surgery, especially focusing on possible differences according to preoperative cyanosis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Remote Ischemic Preconditioning on Children Undergoing Cardiac Surgery
DOC.criteria: open heart surgery under cardiopulmonary bypass: ventricular septal defect, tetralogy of Fallot chromosomal defect airway and parenchymal lung disease blood disorder isolated atrail septal defect immunodeficiency
